metadata.name: HackTool - Potential Impacket Lateral Movement Activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND ((endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\wmiprvse.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\mmc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\explorer.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\services.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/q')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\127.0.0.1\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&1')) OR (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('svchost.exe -k netsvcs')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('taskeng.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('windows\\\\temp\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&1'))))

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://github.com/SecureAuthCorp/impacket/blob/8b1a99f7c715702eafe3f24851817bb64721b156/examples/wmiexec.py, https://github.com/SecureAuthCorp/impacket/blob/8b1a99f7c715702eafe3f24851817bb64721b156/examples/atexec.py, https://github.com/SecureAuthCorp/impacket/blob/8b1a99f7c715702eafe3f24851817bb64721b156/examples/smbexec.py, https://github.com/SecureAuthCorp/impacket/blob/8b1a99f7c715702eafe3f24851817bb64721b156/examples/dcomexec.py, https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/security/current/suspicious-cmd-execution-via-wmi.html
